content: complimentary pattern ashland cowl design by bobbi intveld no 1313l dark chocolate color shown experience level - advanced beginner materials - woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 150g/370yds 1 hank - size 9 5 5 mm 24 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - tapestry needle size - one finished measurements - circumference 30 - height 17 gauge - in basket weave stitch 16 sts and 24 row = 4 abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on k knit p purl pm place marker ashland cowl no 202246 repeat repeat round s round s design by bobbi intveld pattern st s stitch es * repeat the directions between the asterisks as knit with an oversized basket weave stitch larger needles and many times as indicated one 150 gram hank of woolstok worsted this cowl is a quick knit and has great squish appeal cowl co 126 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts round 1 *k10 p2 k2 twice repeat from * to end of round round 2 *p8 k2 p2 k2 twice repeat from * to end of round 1 round 3 repeat round 2 complimentary pattern blue sky fibers chart key knit purl chart 18 17 16 15 14 13 12 11 10 9 8 7 6 5 4 rnds 4-5 repeat round 1 3 rnds 6-7 repeat round 2 2 1 round 8 repeat round 1 round 9 k round 10 *k1 p2 k2 p2 k11 repeat from * to end of round 18-st repeat round 11 *k1 p2 k2 twice p8 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 12 repeat round 11 rnds 13-14 repeat round 10 round 15-16 repeat round 11 round 17 repeat round 10 round 18 k repeat rnds 1-18 five more times bobble loosely finishing weave in ends block to finished dimensions care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2022 this pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this 2 pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 11012022
